name: Momofuku
description: The empire David Chang built, now led by CEO Marguerite Zabar Mariscal.

name: Momofuku Goods
description: CPG arm — Chili Crunch, sauces, noodles. $67M revenue in 2024, 11,000 retail locations.

name: Milk Bar
description: Christina Tosi's bakery empire. Started inside Momofuku, now fully independent.

name: Majordomo Media
description: David Chang's media company — Ugly Delicious, The Dave Chang Show, Dinner Time Live.

name: Zabar's
description: Iconic UWS gourmet grocery. Marguerite Zabar Mariscal is the great-granddaughter of founders Louis and Lillian Zabar.
